dcterms:creator: Vlad Niculae
Joonsuk Park
Claire Cardie
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of user-generated comments from an online platform, focusing on argumentative propositions and their links. It contains 731 user comments with approximately 4,700 propositions, used for evaluating argumentation mining models.
dcterms:title: Cornell eRulemaking Corpus (CDCP)
